verses.text: \w I|strong="H0935"\w* rejoiced \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* things \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w were|strong="H2022"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: We \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* house \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Lord.
\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* feet \w were|strong="H8064"\w* standing \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy courts, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Jerusalem.
\w Jerusalem|strong="H8104"\w*, which is built \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* city, which is compact together.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* thither \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* tribes \w go|strong="H2009"\w* up, \w the|strong="H8104"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* Lord: \w the|strong="H8104"\w* testimony \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* praise \w the|strong="H8104"\w* name \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* Lord.

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* seats \w have|strong="H3068"\w* sat \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w judgment|strong="H3027"\w*, seats \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H3027"\w*.

Pray ye \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* peace \w of|strong="H3808"\w* Jerusalem: \w and|strong="H3915"\w* abundance \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* love thee.
\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* peace \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5315"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* abundance \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy towers.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* sake \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* brethren, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* neighbours, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* spoke peace \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thee.
Because of the house of the Lord our God, I have sought good things for thee.
